name: Ninja Climber Tower
description:
Ninja Climber Tower!!!
In this ninja crazy climber game your strengths are sword and the fighting skills.
Swim,climb and discover secret entrances to a castles. Use underground tunnels,climb on a bridge and try to be invisible as a real ninja warrior of shadow.
Features:
- Amazing levels
- Climbing and fighting skills
- Enjoy free roaming in the area
- Realistic graphics with real physics for best experience
- Amazing background sound
